TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Kerbal Stock Launcher Overhaul (6/6/16 More parts and improvements)

Articles.Content: wow blackheart! it looks so.... kerbal like, amazing! please join Squad!

wow blackheart! it looks so.... kerbal like, amazing! please join Squad!

Well, it's actually easy to spot my parts from the stock ones, they have reverse hazard paints contrary to stock and that's intended. (Just for fun)

I also have basic models, man. Not that much detail and curves cause I suck at them. But I try my best.

YEAAAAAAAAHHHHH XD

Anyways made actual progress for the mod because I just got back for it recently being so frustrated about the hatch of Pteron.

Here, the KR-2D WIP is finally textured. Complete with emissives and an alternate texture. Not sure if there is actually something yet missing except for other type of fairings to be able to launch the Payload Launcher Construction Set.

http://i.imgur.com/QqYf9hX.png

Also made the request texture so I tried to make it look like as requested in this pic.

http://i.imgur.com/EjZJIOT.png

Guess I have to make optional textures for Aerojet Kerbodyne to match up with the construction kit. Huehuehue. Love how my packs actually piece together.

Perfect!!!! That's wonderful I can't wait!

Well, as the guy who made a mod support procedural fairings, why not make my own support it too? Haha. Well, I guess I have to make Pfairing textures that is Kerbal X Pack-alike. Also planning to add the Delta IV's Fairing it has a unique shape that I like.

Next stop - Calibrate a base that can handle KW Rocketry Fairings. Because sometimes you just use KW bases too much that you want to use Kerbal X's.

Nice progress

Oh btw my 1000th post on the forums.. What the heck am I doing with my life

Finally some proper looking CBC textures!

No offense to BlazingAngel who did the first version in the ULA thread, but that texture work never impressed me.

I realize also that this isn't necessarily a replica, but really this is as close as anyone yet has come to reproducing the CBC's accurately and I love it.

Finally some proper looking CBC textures!

No offense to BlazingAngel who did the first version in the ULA thread, but that texture work never impressed me.

I realize also that this isn't necessarily a replica, but really this is as close as anyone yet has come to reproducing the CBC's accurately and I love it.

Just not that much detail as one expects but it's alright. CluelessModeller has done right with Delta-IV too and it looks badass.

Here, not sure what happened to it though.

Well, as the guy who made a mod support procedural fairings, why not make my own support it too? Haha. Well, I guess I have to make Pfairing textures that is Kerbal X Pack-alike. Also planning to add the Delta IV's Fairing it has a unique shape that I like.

http://i.imgur.com/Oc8Otq0.png

Next stop - Calibrate a base that can handle KW Rocketry Fairings. Because sometimes you just use KW bases too much that you want to use Kerbal X's.

Why not just copy the node structure over from one of the KW fairing bases instead of trying to do it manually? Work smart, not hard.

Why not just copy the node structure over from one of the KW fairing bases instead of trying to do it manually? Work smart, not hard.

That's what I am planning initially but if my model structure don't agree with KW Rocketry, node positions will possibly mess up.

Edit: Well, Procedural Support will be packed too on release. Still WIP though

Blackheart, I found something in an older install. Something that looks very nice, and something I think you could do great things with. The Shenron. Is it still being worked on? It looks awesome, and fits some of my design ideas very nicely. (Though, I would bump up crew count to at least 5. There would be a lot of unused space in that pod as is, you could probably get away with up to seven.
*give it to me now*

Re: Delta IV textures from CluelessModeler

He got a job, that takes up much of his time. But, I will supply you with the way that I did them, or, just make some for you. Up to you. But yours looks much more kerbalized, I kind of like it that way.

Either way, up to you! If you want them, just send me the UV file, and I'll match it up for ya when I get a chance!
Will you do a WIP release while the forums are down so we have something?
